source:
%%sql
-- Build ims_information_asset_dim table -- merge

-- Notes - Addresses are only supplied for Inspectors - need to check inspector count against addresses data

-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW ims_information_asset_dim_new 

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.ims_information_assets_number IS NULL
        THEN T3.IMSInformationAssetID
        ELSE NULL
    END                                                                         AS IMSInformationAssetID,
    'No Info' AS InformationAssetIDLegacy,
    'No Info' AS InformationAssetIDCoded,
    T1.name AS InformationAssetName,
    T1.assigned_user_id AS InformationAssetAssignedUserID,
    T1.assigned_user_name AS InformationAssetAssignedUserName,
    T1.ims_information_assets_number AS InformationAssetNumber,
    T1.primary_business_area_c AS InformationAssetPrimaryBusinessArea,
    T1.location_c AS InformationAssetLocation,
    T1.contracted_service_c AS InformationAssetContractedService,
    T1.region_c AS InformationAssetRegion,
    T1.purpose_c AS InformationAssetPurpose,
    T1.financial_value_c AS InformationAssetFinancialValue,
    T1.business_criticality_c AS InformationAssetBusinessCritically,
    T1.data_disposal_routine_c AS InformationAssetDataDisposalRoutine,
    T1.last_current_and_accurate_date AS InformationAssetLastCurrentAccurateDate,
    T1.review_period AS InformationAssetReviewPeriod,
    IFNULL(T1.information_as_num_container_c, concat('IA - ',T1.ims_information_assets_number)) AS InformationAssetInformationAsNumberContainer,
    T1.help AS InformationAssetHelp,
    T1.user_licences AS InformationAssetUserLicenses,
    T1.superuser_licences AS InformationAssetSuperUserLicenses,
    T1.sys_admin_licences AS InformationAssetSysAdminLicenses,
    T1.infosec_risk_register AS InformationAssetInfosecRiskRegister,
    T1.custodian AS InformationAssetCustodian,
    T1.date_of_last_dr_check AS InformationAssetDateLastDrCheck,
    T1.backup_location AS InformationAssetBackUpLocation,
    T1.dr_check_frequency AS InformationAssetDrCheckFrequency,
    T1.backup_frequency AS InformationAssetBackupFrequency,
    T1.asset_format_list_c AS InformationAssetFormatList,
    T1.management_register_text_c AS InformationAssetManagementRegister,
    T1.software_version AS InformationAssetSoftwareVersion,
    T1.access_control_method AS InformationAssetAccessControlMethod,
    T1.backup_required AS InformationAssetBackUpRequired,
    T1.decommission_date AS InformationAssetDecommisionDate,
    T1.dr_test_required AS InformationAssetDrTestRequired,
    T1.encryption_at_rest AS InformationAssetEncryptionAtRest,
    T1.ims_information_assets_ims_data_flow_1 AS InformationAssetsIMSDataFlow1,
    T1.ims_information_assets_ims_data_flow_2 AS InformationAssetsIMSDataFlow2,
    T1.ims_information_assets_ims_master_data_map_1 AS InformationAssetsIMSMasterDataMap1,
    T1.ims_information_assets_ims_information_assets_1 AS InformationAssetsIMSINformationAssets1,
    T1.ims_information_assets_ims_information_assets_1_name AS InformationAssetsIMSINformationAssetsName1,
    T1.ims_inform2f55_assets_ida AS InformationAssetsIda,
    'No Info' AS InformationAssetsAOSContracts,
    T1.status AS InformationAssetStatus,
    T1.date_of_next_review_c AS InformationAssetDateNextReview,
    T1.owner_c AS InformationAssetOwner,
    T1.risk_assessment_type_c AS InformationAssetRiskAssesmentType,
    T1.link_to_risk_assessment_c AS InformationAssetLinkToRiskAssessment,
    T1.date_modified AS InformationAssetDateModified,
    T1.SecurityGroups AS InformationAssetSecurityGroups,
    T1.assigned_user_link AS InformationAssetAssignedUserLink,
    T1.created_by AS InformationAssetCreatedBy,
    T1.created_by_link AS InformationAssetCreatedByLink,
    T1.created_by_name AS InformationAssetCreatedByName,
    T1.date_entered AS InformationAssetDateEntered,
    T1.deleted AS InformationAssetDeleted,
    T1.description AS InformationAssetDescription,
    T1.modified_by_name AS InformationAssetModifiedByName,
    T1.modified_user_id AS InformationAssetModifiedByUserID,
    T1.modified_user_link AS InformationAssetModifiedByUserLink,
    T1.priority AS InformationAssetPriority,
    T1.resolution AS InformationAssetResolution,
    T1.type AS InformationAssetType,
    T1.work_log AS InformationAssetWorkLog,
    T2.SourceSystemID                                                           AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)                                              AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                                                        AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat( 
        '.', 
        '.',  
        IFNULL(T1.name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_information_assets_number,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.primary_business_area_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.location_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.contracted_service_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.region_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.purpose_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.financial_value_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.business_criticality_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.data_disposal_routine_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.last_current_and_accurate_date,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.review_period,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.information_as_num_container_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.help,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.user_licences,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.superuser_licences,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.sys_admin_licences,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.infosec_risk_register,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.custodian,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_of_last_dr_check,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.backup_location,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.dr_check_frequency,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.backup_frequency,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.asset_format_list_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.management_register_text_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.software_version,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.access_control_method,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.backup_required,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.decommission_date,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.dr_test_required,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.encryption_at_rest,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_information_assets_ims_data_flow_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_information_assets_ims_data_flow_2,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_information_assets_ims_master_data_map_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_information_assets_ims_information_assets_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_information_assets_ims_information_assets_1_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_inform2f55_assets_ida,'.'), 
        '.',
        IFNULL(T1.status,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_of_next_review_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.owner_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.risk_assessment_type_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.link_to_risk_assessment_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_modified,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.SecurityGroups,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_link,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.created_by,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.created_by_link,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.created_by_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_entered,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.deleted,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.description,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.modified_by_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.modified_user_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.modified_user_link,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.priority,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.resolution,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.type,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.work_log,'.')))                                     AS RowID, 
    'Y'                                                                         AS IsActive, 
    T3.IsActive                                                                 AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.ims_informationasset_new T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 
    ON  "IMS" = T2.Description AND 
        T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.ims_information_asset_dim T3 
    ON  T1.ims_information_assets_number = T3.InformationAssetNumber AND 
        T3.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
            WHEN    T1.ims_information_assets_number = T3.InformationAssetNumber AND 
                    md5(concat(
                        '.',
                        '.', 
                        IFNULL(T1.name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_id,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_information_assets_number,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.primary_business_area_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.location_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.contracted_service_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.region_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.purpose_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.financial_value_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.business_criticality_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.data_disposal_routine_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.last_current_and_accurate_date,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.review_period,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.information_as_num_container_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.help,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.user_licences,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.superuser_licences,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.sys_admin_licences,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.infosec_risk_register,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.custodian,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_of_last_dr_check,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.backup_location,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.dr_check_frequency,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.backup_frequency,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.asset_format_list_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.management_register_text_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.software_version,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.access_control_method,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.backup_required,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.decommission_date,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.dr_test_required,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.encryption_at_rest,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_information_assets_ims_data_flow_1,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_information_assets_ims_data_flow_2,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_information_assets_ims_master_data_map_1,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_information_assets_ims_information_assets_1,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_information_assets_ims_information_assets_1_name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_inform2f55_assets_ida,'.'), 
                        '.',
                        IFNULL(T1.status,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_of_next_review_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.owner_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.risk_assessment_type_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.link_to_risk_assessment_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_modified,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.SecurityGroups,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_link,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.created_by,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.created_by_link,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.created_by_name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_entered,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.deleted,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.description,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.modified_by_name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.modified_user_id,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.modified_user_link,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.priority,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.resolution,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.type,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.work_log,'.')))  <> T3.RowID     
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T3.IMSInformationAssetID IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' )
    AND T1.ims_information_assets_number IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.ims_informationasset_new);

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **ims_information_asset_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View ims_information_asset_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql

-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW ims_information_asset_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

SELECT DISTINCT
    IMSInformationAssetID,
    InformationAssetIDLegacy,
    InformationAssetIDCoded,
    InformationAssetName,
    InformationAssetAssignedUserID,
    InformationAssetAssignedUserName,
    InformationAssetNumber,
    InformationAssetPrimaryBusinessArea,
    InformationAssetLocation,
    InformationAssetContractedService,
    InformationAssetRegion,
    InformationAssetPurpose,
    InformationAssetFinancialValue,
    InformationAssetBusinessCritically,
    InformationAssetDataDisposalRoutine,
    InformationAssetLastCurrentAccurateDate,
    InformationAssetReviewPeriod,
    InformationAssetInformationAsNumberContainer,
    InformationAssetHelp,
    InformationAssetUserLicenses,
    InformationAssetSuperUserLicenses,
    InformationAssetSysAdminLicenses,
    InformationAssetInfosecRiskRegister,
    InformationAssetCustodian,
    InformationAssetDateLastDrCheck,
    InformationAssetBackUpLocation,
    InformationAssetDrCheckFrequency,
    InformationAssetBackupFrequency,
    InformationAssetFormatList,
    InformationAssetManagementRegister,
    InformationAssetSoftwareVersion,
    InformationAssetAccessControlMethod,
    InformationAssetBackUpRequired,
    InformationAssetDecommisionDate,
    InformationAssetDrTestRequired,
    InformationAssetEncryptionAtRest,
    InformationAssetsIMSDataFlow1,
    InformationAssetsIMSDataFlow2,
    InformationAssetsIMSMasterDataMap1,
    InformationAssetsIMSINformationAssets1,
    InformationAssetsIMSINformationAssetsName1,
    InformationAssetsIda,
    InformationAssetsAOSContracts,
    InformationAssetStatus,
    InformationAssetDateNextReview,
    InformationAssetOwner,
    InformationAssetRiskAssesmentType,
    InformationAssetLinkToRiskAssessment,
    InformationAssetDateModified,
    InformationAssetSecurityGroups,
    InformationAssetAssignedUserLink,
    InformationAssetCreatedBy,
    InformationAssetCreatedByLink,
    InformationAssetCreatedByName,
    InformationAssetDateEntered,
    InformationAssetDeleted,
    InformationAssetDescription,
    InformationAssetModifiedByName,
    InformationAssetModifiedByUserID,
    InformationAssetModifiedByUserLink,
    InformationAssetPriority,
    InformationAssetResolution,
    InformationAssetType,
    InformationAssetWorkLog,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From ims_information_asset_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT DISTINCT
    IMSInformationAssetID,
    InformationAssetIDLegacy,
    InformationAssetIDCoded,
    InformationAssetName,
    InformationAssetAssignedUserID,
    InformationAssetAssignedUserName,
    InformationAssetNumber,
    InformationAssetPrimaryBusinessArea,
    InformationAssetLocation,
    InformationAssetContractedService,
    InformationAssetRegion,
    InformationAssetPurpose,
    InformationAssetFinancialValue,
    InformationAssetBusinessCritically,
    InformationAssetDataDisposalRoutine,
    InformationAssetLastCurrentAccurateDate,
    InformationAssetReviewPeriod,
    InformationAssetInformationAsNumberContainer,
    InformationAssetHelp,
    InformationAssetUserLicenses,
    InformationAssetSuperUserLicenses,
    InformationAssetSysAdminLicenses,
    InformationAssetInfosecRiskRegister,
    InformationAssetCustodian,
    InformationAssetDateLastDrCheck,
    InformationAssetBackUpLocation,
    InformationAssetDrCheckFrequency,
    InformationAssetBackupFrequency,
    InformationAssetFormatList,
    InformationAssetManagementRegister,
    InformationAssetSoftwareVersion,
    InformationAssetAccessControlMethod,
    InformationAssetBackUpRequired,
    InformationAssetDecommisionDate,
    InformationAssetDrTestRequired,
    InformationAssetEncryptionAtRest,
    InformationAssetsIMSDataFlow1,
    InformationAssetsIMSDataFlow2,
    InformationAssetsIMSMasterDataMap1,
    InformationAssetsIMSINformationAssets1,
    InformationAssetsIMSINformationAssetsName1,
    InformationAssetsIda,
    InformationAssetsAOSContracts,
    InformationAssetStatus,
    InformationAssetDateNextReview,
    InformationAssetOwner,
    InformationAssetRiskAssesmentType,
    InformationAssetLinkToRiskAssessment,
    InformationAssetDateModified,
    InformationAssetSecurityGroups,
    InformationAssetAssignedUserLink,
    InformationAssetCreatedBy,
    InformationAssetCreatedByLink,
    InformationAssetCreatedByName,
    InformationAssetDateEntered,
    InformationAssetDeleted,
    InformationAssetDescription,
    InformationAssetModifiedByName,
    InformationAssetModifiedByUserID,
    InformationAssetModifiedByUserLink,
    InformationAssetPriority,
    InformationAssetResolution,
    InformationAssetType,
    InformationAssetWorkLog,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.ims_information_asset_dim
WHERE InformationAssetNumber IN (SELECT InformationAssetNumber FROM ims_information_asset_dim_new WHERE IMSInformationAssetID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM ims_information_asset_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW ims_information_asset_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    IMSInformationAssetID,
    InformationAssetIDLegacy,
    InformationAssetIDCoded,
    InformationAssetName,
    InformationAssetAssignedUserID,
    InformationAssetAssignedUserName,
    InformationAssetNumber,
    InformationAssetPrimaryBusinessArea,
    InformationAssetLocation,
    InformationAssetContractedService,
    InformationAssetRegion,
    InformationAssetPurpose,
    InformationAssetFinancialValue,
    InformationAssetBusinessCritically,
    InformationAssetDataDisposalRoutine,
    InformationAssetLastCurrentAccurateDate,
    InformationAssetReviewPeriod,
    InformationAssetInformationAsNumberContainer,
    InformationAssetHelp,
    InformationAssetUserLicenses,
    InformationAssetSuperUserLicenses,
    InformationAssetSysAdminLicenses,
    InformationAssetInfosecRiskRegister,
    InformationAssetCustodian,
    InformationAssetDateLastDrCheck,
    InformationAssetBackUpLocation,
    InformationAssetDrCheckFrequency,
    InformationAssetBackupFrequency,
    InformationAssetFormatList,
    InformationAssetManagementRegister,
    InformationAssetSoftwareVersion,
    InformationAssetAccessControlMethod,
    InformationAssetBackUpRequired,
    InformationAssetDecommisionDate,
    InformationAssetDrTestRequired,
    InformationAssetEncryptionAtRest,
    InformationAssetsIMSDataFlow1,
    InformationAssetsIMSDataFlow2,
    InformationAssetsIMSMasterDataMap1,
    InformationAssetsIMSINformationAssets1,
    InformationAssetsIMSINformationAssetsName1,
    InformationAssetsIda,
    InformationAssetsAOSContracts,
    InformationAssetStatus,
    InformationAssetDateNextReview,
    InformationAssetOwner,
    InformationAssetRiskAssesmentType,
    InformationAssetLinkToRiskAssessment,
    InformationAssetDateModified,
    InformationAssetSecurityGroups,
    InformationAssetAssignedUserLink,
    InformationAssetCreatedBy,
    InformationAssetCreatedByLink,
    InformationAssetCreatedByName,
    InformationAssetDateEntered,
    InformationAssetDeleted,
    InformationAssetDescription,
    InformationAssetModifiedByName,
    InformationAssetModifiedByUserID,
    InformationAssetModifiedByUserLink,
    InformationAssetPriority,
    InformationAssetResolution,
    InformationAssetType,
    InformationAssetWorkLog,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM ims_information_asset_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View ims_information_asset_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. Pers_No from SAP HR), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.ims_information_asset_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.ims_information_asset_dim AS Target
USING ims_information_asset_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.IMSInformationAssetID = Target.IMSInformationAssetID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (IMSInformationAssetID,
        InformationAssetIDLegacy,
        InformationAssetIDCoded,
        InformationAssetName,
        InformationAssetAssignedUserID,
        InformationAssetAssignedUserName,
        InformationAssetNumber,
        InformationAssetPrimaryBusinessArea,
        InformationAssetLocation,
        InformationAssetContractedService,
        InformationAssetRegion,
        InformationAssetPurpose,
        InformationAssetFinancialValue,
        InformationAssetBusinessCritically,
        InformationAssetDataDisposalRoutine,
        InformationAssetLastCurrentAccurateDate,
        InformationAssetReviewPeriod,
        InformationAssetInformationAsNumberContainer,
        InformationAssetHelp,
        InformationAssetUserLicenses,
        InformationAssetSuperUserLicenses,
        InformationAssetSysAdminLicenses,
        InformationAssetInfosecRiskRegister,
        InformationAssetCustodian,
        InformationAssetDateLastDrCheck,
        InformationAssetBackUpLocation,
        InformationAssetDrCheckFrequency,
        InformationAssetBackupFrequency,
        InformationAssetFormatList,
        InformationAssetManagementRegister,
        InformationAssetSoftwareVersion,
        InformationAssetAccessControlMethod,
        InformationAssetBackUpRequired,
        InformationAssetDecommisionDate,
        InformationAssetDrTestRequired,
        InformationAssetEncryptionAtRest,
        InformationAssetsIMSDataFlow1,
        InformationAssetsIMSDataFlow2,
        InformationAssetsIMSMasterDataMap1,
        InformationAssetsIMSINformationAssets1,
        InformationAssetsIMSINformationAssetsName1,
        InformationAssetsIda,
        InformationAssetsAOSContracts,
        InformationAssetStatus,
        InformationAssetDateNextReview,
        InformationAssetOwner,
        InformationAssetRiskAssesmentType,
        InformationAssetLinkToRiskAssessment,
        InformationAssetDateModified,
        InformationAssetSecurityGroups,
        InformationAssetAssignedUserLink,
        InformationAssetCreatedBy,
        InformationAssetCreatedByLink,
        InformationAssetCreatedByName,
        InformationAssetDateEntered,
        InformationAssetDeleted,
        InformationAssetDescription,
        InformationAssetModifiedByName,
        InformationAssetModifiedByUserID,
        InformationAssetModifiedByUserLink,
        InformationAssetPriority,
        InformationAssetResolution,
        InformationAssetType,
        InformationAssetWorkLog,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)  
        VALUES (Source.IMSInformationAssetID,
        Source.InformationAssetIDLegacy,
        Source.InformationAssetIDCoded,
        Source.InformationAssetName,
        Source.InformationAssetAssignedUserID,
        Source.InformationAssetAssignedUserName,
        Source.InformationAssetNumber,
        Source.InformationAssetPrimaryBusinessArea,
        Source.InformationAssetLocation,
        Source.InformationAssetContractedService,
        Source.InformationAssetRegion,
        Source.InformationAssetPurpose,
        Source.InformationAssetFinancialValue,
        Source.InformationAssetBusinessCritically,
        Source.InformationAssetDataDisposalRoutine,
        Source.InformationAssetLastCurrentAccurateDate,
        Source.InformationAssetReviewPeriod,
        Source.InformationAssetInformationAsNumberContainer,
        Source.InformationAssetHelp,
        Source.InformationAssetUserLicenses,
        Source.InformationAssetSuperUserLicenses,
        Source.InformationAssetSysAdminLicenses,
        Source.InformationAssetInfosecRiskRegister,
        Source.InformationAssetCustodian,
        Source.InformationAssetDateLastDrCheck,
        Source.InformationAssetBackUpLocation,
        Source.InformationAssetDrCheckFrequency,
        Source.InformationAssetBackupFrequency,
        Source.InformationAssetFormatList,
        Source.InformationAssetManagementRegister,
        Source.InformationAssetSoftwareVersion,
        Source.InformationAssetAccessControlMethod,
        Source.InformationAssetBackUpRequired,
        Source.InformationAssetDecommisionDate,
        Source.InformationAssetDrTestRequired,
        Source.InformationAssetEncryptionAtRest,
        Source.InformationAssetsIMSDataFlow1,
        Source.InformationAssetsIMSDataFlow2,
        Source.InformationAssetsIMSMasterDataMap1,
        Source.InformationAssetsIMSINformationAssets1,
        Source.InformationAssetsIMSINformationAssetsName1,
        Source.InformationAssetsIda,
        Source.InformationAssetsAOSContracts,
        Source.InformationAssetStatus,
        Source.InformationAssetDateNextReview,
        Source.InformationAssetOwner,
        Source.InformationAssetRiskAssesmentType,
        Source.InformationAssetLinkToRiskAssessment,
        Source.InformationAssetDateModified,
        Source.InformationAssetSecurityGroups,
        Source.InformationAssetAssignedUserLink,
        Source.InformationAssetCreatedBy,
        Source.InformationAssetCreatedByLink,
        Source.InformationAssetCreatedByName,
        Source.InformationAssetDateEntered,
        Source.InformationAssetDeleted,
        Source.InformationAssetDescription,
        Source.InformationAssetModifiedByName,
        Source.InformationAssetModifiedByUserID,
        Source.InformationAssetModifiedByUserLink,
        Source.InformationAssetPriority,
        Source.InformationAssetResolution,
        Source.InformationAssetType,
        Source.InformationAssetWorkLog,
        Source.SourceSystemID, 
        Source.IngestionDate, 
        Source.ValidTo, 
        Source.RowID, 
        Source.IsActive) ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.ims_information_asset_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new SecureInfoID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.ims_information_asset_dim 

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY IMSInformationAssetID NULLS LAST) AS IMSInformationAssetID,
    InformationAssetIDLegacy,
    InformationAssetIDCoded,
    InformationAssetName,
    InformationAssetAssignedUserID,
    InformationAssetAssignedUserName,
    InformationAssetNumber,
